name: Air Flight Simulation
overview: Take your computer to the skies in Air Flight Simulator as you practice and train to become an expert in piloting maneuvers such as take-offs and landings, as well as learn to use plane instrumentation. This is a title that can be enjoyed by both plane enthusiasts and computer hobbyists as it blends together both aspects of simulation as well as provides the fun and entertainment of a game. Monitor your altitude, airspeed, direction (via compass) engine stress, and the amount of miles traveled. With a maximum range of around 50 miles, you can explore your own piloting abilities and put your skills to the test.
